section.author: twain
section.title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
section.para: He got home pretty late that night, and when he climbed cautiously in at the window, he uncovered an ambuscade, in the person of his aunt; and when she saw the state his clothes were in her resolution to turn his Saturday holiday into captivity at hard labor became adamantine in its firmness.

section.author: joyce
section.title: Ulysses
section.para: A man of genius makes no mistakes. His errors are volitional and are the portals of discovery.
